Methods in org.codemonkey.simplejavamail with parameters of type Email
private  Message Mailer.prepareMessage(Email email, MimeMultipart multipartRoot)
          Creates a new MimeMessage instance and prepares it in the email structure, so that it can be filled and send.
 void Mailer.sendMail(Email email)
          Processes an Email instance into a completely configured Message, which in turn is being sent to all defined recipients using MailSession.sendMessage(Message).
private  void Mailer.setAttachments(Email email, MimeMultipart multipartRoot)
          Fills the Message instance with the attachments from the Email.
private  void Mailer.setEmbeddedImages(Email email, MimeMultipart multipartRelated)

private  void Mailer.setTexts(Email email, MimeMultipart multipartAlternativeMessages)
